#### Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(sf)
library(countrycode)
```

#### Reading in

GII csv

```{r}
GII <- read_csv("data/hdr-data.csv") %>%
  clean_names()
```

World geojson

```{r}
world_sf <- read_sf("data/World_Countries_(Generalized)_9029012925078512962.geojson") %>%
  mutate(iso3 = countrycode(ISO, origin = 'iso2c',destination = 'iso3c', nomatch = NA))
```

#### Tidying

```{r}
unique(GII$indicator) 

GII_clean <- GII %>%
  filter(indicator == "Gender Inequality Index (value)",
         year == '2010' | year == '2019') %>%
  select(country_iso_code,country,year,value)%>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = year, values_from = value, names_prefix = 'y') %>%
  mutate(difference = y2019 - y2010)
```

#### Merging

```{r}
GII_world <- GII_clean %>%
  merge(.,
        world_sf,
        by.x = 'country_iso_code',
        by.y = 'iso3')
```
